meanings.definition: A person who carries a cross.
meanings.sent1: The crossbearers walked solemnly in the procession.
meanings.sent2: The crossbearers helped carry the heavy cross during the religious ceremony.
meanings.sent3: The crossbearers joked about starting a cross-carrying race.
meanings.sent4: The crossbearers symbolized strength and faith as they bore the cross together.
meanings.sent5: The image of the crossbearers stayed with the congregation long after the ceremony ended.

meanings.definition: Those who support or advocate for a particular cause or belief.
meanings.sent1: The crossbearers of the environmental movement organized a tree-planting event.
meanings.sent2: The crossbearers of equality marched in unity for their cause.
meanings.sent3: The crossbearers of the ice cream club campaigned for more flavors.
meanings.sent4: The crossbearers of justice fought tirelessly for the rights of all.
meanings.sent5: The dedication of the crossbearers inspired others to join their cause.
